summary: This bill, the Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Boundary Study Act, aims to redesignate the Salem Maritime National Historic Site as the Salem Maritime National Historical Park. It also mandates the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a boundary study to assess the potential for expanding the park to encompass sites and resources related to maritime, coastal defenses, and military history in Salem, Massachusetts, and its surrounding areas, including the Salem Armory Visitor Center and Park. A report on the study's findings and recommendations is to be submitted to relevant congressional committees within three years.
